name: "Family Guy Viewer Mail #1" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the first vignette, where does Peter find the genie?
questions.explanation:
A beer bottle.

	Peter opens his beer bottle and a genie grants him three wishes.  His first wish is to see Kelly Ripa in her dressing room.

questions.text: For Peter's second wish in the first vignette, he asks for his own theme music.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The theme music is also the same music used in the fake TV show called "The Communists" which was used in a previous episode.

questions.text: For Peter's third wish in the first vignette, what does Peter wish he doesn't have?
questions.explanation:
Bones.

	Peter becomes a gelatinous blob and turns back to normal after complicated surgery and bones from the rest of the family.

questions.text: In "Supergriffins", what causes the Griffins to have superpowers?
questions.explanation:
Toxic waste.

	After crashing onto their front lawn, a toxic waste truck douses the family and they all get their powers which they use to rule the town.

Super speed.

	Brian is able to travel from Quahog to England and back in less than one second.  He doesn't use his powers much.

Growing her fingernails.

	Meg can extend and retract her fingernails and can't do much with her ability, so she mostly backs off during the ordeal.

questions.text: In "Li'l Griffins", how does Joe move around?
questions.explanation:
Wagon.

	Since this is just a short vignette, nothing about the short carries on into the actual show, so even when he's small, Joe has paralyzed legs.

questions.text: Who does not go into the Selburg Mansion in "Li'l Griffins"?
questions.explanation:
Lois.

	Quagmire and Peter are fighting over Lois, and they spend the night in the Selburg Mansion to win her over.  She ends up being with Mort Goldman.

questions.text: Does Death appear in any of the vignettes?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Death is in his toddler years in "Li'l Griffins".  We see him in the schoolyard and Peter makes fun of him.

questions.text: What vignette does Quagmire appear in?
questions.explanation:
Li'l Griffins.

	Quagmire is fighting Peter for Lois in "Li'l Griffins".  That  vignette is also the only appearance of Joe and Quagmire in this whole episode.
